blogPost.excerpt: Zeta Joint Cards are designed for the modern couple. Couples get a joint account and two debit cards, allowing both partners to keep tabs on their shared finances including paying bills and saving together. Our goal is to make shared banking delightful.
blogPost.body: Zeta Joint Cards are designed for the modern couple. Couples get a joint account and two debit cards, allowing both partners to keep tabs on their shared finances including paying bills and saving together. Our goal is to make shared banking delightful.
blogPost.title: Zeta Joint Cards - Shared banking for modern couples
blogPost.author: Charles Hudson

localize.description: Zeta联名卡是为现代夫妇设计的。夫妻双方可获得一个联名账户和两张借记卡，让双方都能掌握共同的财务状况，包括共同支付账单和储蓄。我们的目标是让共同的银行业务变得更愉快。
localize.tagline: 现代夫妇的共同银行业务

localize.description: Zeta聯名卡是爲現代夫婦設計的。夫妻雙方可獲得一個聯名賬戶和兩張借記卡，讓雙方都能掌握共同的財務狀況，包括共同支付賬單和儲蓄。我們的目標是讓共同的銀行業務變得更愉快。
localize.tagline: 現代夫婦的共同銀行業務

previous.excerpt: ProdEasy is a product management platform that smart teams use to put the customer at the center of all their product management activities.
previous.title: Prodeasy - Product Management platform for the teams of all sizes

localize.description: ProdEasy是一个产品管理平台，聪明的团队使用它来将客户置于所有产品管理活动的中心。
localize.tagline: 为各种规模的团队提供产品管理平台

localize.description: ProdEasy是一個產品管理平臺，聰明的團隊使用它來將客戶置於所有產品管理活動的中心。
localize.tagline: 爲各種規模的團隊提供產品管理平臺

next.excerpt: Gawq unravels echo chambers by serving you algorithm-free news, hyper-focused on transparency, social impact and unbiased reporting. Compare the news, mute the noise, and read between the headlines from over 150+ media sources daily.
next.title: Gawq - Unbreaking news. Stay informed, mindfully.

localize.description: Gawq通过为您提供无算法的新闻、高度关注透明度、社会影响和公正的报道来揭开回声室的面纱。比较新闻，让噪音静音，并从每天超过150个媒体来源的标题之间阅读。
localize.tagline: 突破性的新闻。掌握信息，心中有数。

localize.description: Gawq通過爲您提供無算法的新聞、高度關注透明度、社會影響和公正的報道來揭開回聲室的面紗。比較新聞，讓噪音靜音，並從每天超過150個媒體來源的標題之間閱讀。
localize.tagline: 突破性的新聞。掌握信息，心中有數。
